data.title: Hadoop Developer Resume
data.meta_description: 8+ years of overall IT experience on various technologies like Big Data Hadoop, Java, Tableau and Lotus Notes Domino.2+ years of experience in Hadoop and its components HDFS, Map Reduce, Apache Pig, Hive, Sqoop and JavaStrong experience on Hadoop architecture, Hadoop Distributed File System and Hadoop ecosystemsStrong experience on Map Reduce, Apache Pig, Hive and Sqoop
data.text:
SUMMARY

8+ years of overall IT experience on various technologies like Big Data Hadoop, Java, Tableau and Lotus Notes Domino.

2+ years of experience in Hadoop and its components HDFS, Map Reduce, Apache Pig, Hive, Sqoop and Java

Strong experience on Hadoop architecture, Hadoop Distributed File System and Hadoop ecosystems

Strong experience on Map Reduce, Apache Pig, Hive and Sqoop

Proficient in writing Map Reduce Programs and Pig Scripts

Hands on experience in exporting processed data to MySql

Hands on experience in Generating custom Visualization reports by using Tableau

Practical Knowledge in Cluster Setup, Hbase, Oozie and MongoDB

Basic understanding of Flume, YARN

Has executed projects using Java technologies such as Core Java, Servlets, JSP

Extensive Experience in Lotus Notes development

Involved in complete Software Development Lifecycle

Experience in migration notes applications to GAE (Google App Engine) by using OrangeScape, Google App Engine (GAE)

Expertise in developing teh presentation layer components using xPages, HTML, JavaScript, XML, XSLT, HTML, WML.

Good knowledge of Oracle, MySQL and Data Store databases

Basic Knowledge on ETL tool Datastage

Extensive experience in Banking, Electronics and Telecom domains

Worked for prestigious client in electronic sector like Confidential Canada, Confidential Canada, banking Sector Confidential Bank, Confidential Bank Denmark

Strong Analytical Solving and Logical Skills

Highly developed interpersonal & communication skills with teh ability to liaise at all levels Achievement oriented with a quest for knowledge and technologies

An ability to adapt various technologies with ease

TECHNICAL SKILLS

Hadoop Echo Systems: HDFS, Map Reduce, Apache PIG, HIVE, SQOOP, Hbase, Oozie

Frame Works: Map Reduce, Lotus Script

Groupware Technologies: Lotus Notes R8

Servers: Domino, WebLogic 10.3

Database: Lotus Notes, Oracle, MySQL, Data Store

Java Technologies: Core Java, Servlets, JSP and Android

Cloud Technologies: Google Apps(GAE), OrangeScape

Tools: NetBeans, Eclipse, SQL Developer, WinSCP, Putty, DLI Up loader, Quality Center(QC), CITRIX, Notes Designer, Team Studio, Workflow Tool, LEI Administrator, Lotus Sametime

Knowledge on: Data Stage, Android

Markup Languages: HTML, XML,XSLT,WML

Scripting Languages: Lotus Formula, Lotus Script, JavaScript, PIG

Platforms: MS Windows XP/ 7 Professional, Unix and Linux

PROFESSIONAL EXPERIENCE

Confidential

Hadoop Developer

Responsibilities:

Involved in analysis of log data for analyzing and understanding its data pattern.

Involved in gathering teh business requirements and understanding it.

Involved in System Design and documentation based upon teh business requirement.

Developed scripts for moving all log data files from local file system (LFS) to Hadoop Distributed file System (HDFS) for further processing.

Written teh Map Reduce jobs and Apache PIG scripts to process log files on HDFS.

Created Hive tables to store teh processed results in a tabular format.

Generated reports based on teh data available on Hive tables by using Tableau.

Developed teh Sqoop scripts in order to make teh interaction between Hadoop System and MySQL Database and export data from Hive tables to MySql tables.

Written CLI commands using HDFS.

Setting up crone jobs to delete hadoop logs/local old job files/cluster temp files

Coordinating teh team while integrating code

Assisted testing team by seeding data at database for test cases execution

Supported AMS team as Deployment prime from development team

Environment: Linux, Windows 7, HDFS, Map Reduce, Apache PIG, HIVE, SQOOP, MySQL, Eclipse, Winscp, Putty

Confidential

Hadoop Developer

Responsibilities:

Developed LN tools for identifying all teh Lotusnotes applications which data to be migrated.

Involved in analyzing teh Lotusnotes data to migrated based on teh provided business requirement.

Developed Scripts to export data pertaining to each application from Lotusnotes databases.

Developed scripts for moving all log data files from local file system (LFS) to Hadoop Distributed file System (HDFS) for further processing.

Written teh Map Reduce jobs and Apache PIG scripts to process log files on HDFS.

Created Hive tables to store teh processed results in a tabular format.

Generated reports based on teh data available on Hive tables by using Tableau.

Written CLI commands using HDFS.

Coordinating teh team while integrating code

Assisted testing team by seeding data at database for test cases execution

Supported AMS team as Deployment prime from development team

Environment: Linux, Windows 7, Lotusnotes, HDFS, Map Reduce, Apache PIG, HIVE, Oracle, Eclipse, Putty

Confidential

Product Developer and Tech Lead

Responsibilities:

Involved in all SDLC (Software Development Life Cycle) Phases of teh project

Responsible for understanding existing notes applications functionality and dependency on other notes applications

Responsible for preparing teh technical documents by analyzing teh requirements given a functional document from product definition Team

Responsible to present teh technical documents to teh stake holders and get teh documents signed off

Responsible for taking teh backing of existing applications in to Cloud and make them read only for temporary access

Worked on teh application using Orangescape for development tool and Google App Engine for host teh application

Worked closely with Orangescape technical team for getting customized functionality

Responsible for writing Client side validations using JavaScript and creating Ajax requested for some requirements of IPA and LPA

Worked on production support for fixing production issues

Responsible for implementing enhancements suggested by teh clients

Involved in some of teh CSS files editing

Involved in applying Bootstrap theme for responsive UI design

Supporting teh product during integration, preproduction, UAT and production phases. Used QC tool for problem tracking

Responsible for creating change request and getting approvals for moving application changes to production

Code reviews to make sure teh code is aligned to teh industry standards and security compliance

Environment: Lotus notes R8, Windows 7, OrangeScape, Google App Engine, Netbeans, Edit Plus, HTML, Bootstrap and JavaScript

Confidential

Product Developer

Responsibilities:

Involved in all phases of teh project development

Involved in understanding teh requirement, design, develop and testing teh whole application

Responsible for preparing teh technical documents by analyzing teh requirements given a functional document from product definition Team

Responsible to present teh technical documents to teh stake holders and get teh documents signed off

Supporting teh product during integration, preproduction, UAT and production phases. Used QC tool for problem tracking

Responsible for implementing enhancements suggested by teh clients

Worked on production support for fixing production issues

Code reviews to make sure teh code is aligned to teh industry standards and security compliance

Responsible for creating change request and getting approvals for moving application changes to production

Environment: Lotus Notes R7, Windows XP, HTML, AJAX and JavaScript

Supporting teh product during integration, preproduction, UAT and production phases. Used QC tool for problem tracking

Responsible for updating teh technical documents by analyzing teh requirements given a functional document from product definition Team

Lotusnotes Developer

Responsibilities:

Involved in understanding teh requirement, design, develop and testing teh whole application

Responsible for preparing teh technical documents by analyzing teh requirements given a functional document from product definition Team

Developed teh application using HTML, XML, XSLT, Ajax and JQuery
